name: Red Hag
description: The Red Hag is a Medium-sized fey creature with a malevolent appearance, often embodying traits of mischief and cunning. Its powerful physical attacks are supplemented by dark magic.
memorable: Its Blood Sense ability allows it to track living creatures, and it can amplify its spells after draining blood from enemies.
goals: To cause suffering and mischief while overpowering foes with its cunning and magic.
relations: Similar creatures in fey lore and other hags may be encountered alongside the Red Hag.
environment: The Red Hag can be found in diverse environments, thriving in areas where it can exert control and spread chaos.
strengths: Notable strengths include high spellcasting ability, magic resistance, and a variety of special abilities.
weaknesses: It is vulnerable to ranged attacks and magical effects that do not require Constitution saving throws.
attacks: Claw attack dealing slashing and necrotic damage, potent Blood Bolt ranged spell, and devastating Siphon Blood ability.
most_powerful_ability: Siphon Blood, which drains life from nearby creatures and empowers its next spell.
senses: It has a passive perception of 18, allowing it to notice details and threats effectively.
skills: Noteworthy skills include high proficiency in Arcana, Deception, Insight, and Perception.
additional_information: Amphibious, able to breathe both air and water
Blood Sense can locate creatures within 60 feet
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance
Combat tactics enhanced by spellcasting abilities
spellcasting: The Red Hag can cast spells using Wisdom, including healing, control water, and nature manipulations.
test_queries: cunning fey creature with dark magic
hag that drains blood and casts spells
malevolent spellcaster that uses necrotic damage
creature that communicates with beasts and senses blood
